summary: WE HAVE HAD AT LEAST 5 SIDEWALL BLOWOUTS ON THE REAR OF OUR AMBULANCES IN THE LAST 9 MONTHS. THE LATEST BEING YESTERDAY.  WE ARE USING MICHELEN XPS RADIALS. DOT FWJHAHWX1702.  THERE IS 10/32 TREAD LEFT ON THE TIRE.  OTHERS HAVE HAD MORE SOME LESS.  THIS ONLY OCCURS ON THE REAR OF THE VEHICLE.  I HAVE E-MAILED MICHELIN WITH THIS PROBLEM BUT HAVE GOT NO RESPONSE. PLEASE ADVISE ME OF REMEDY.  THIS MAY BE OF A SAFETY CONCERN.  THANK YOU.
